javadoc.text: * BiCG solver. BiCG solves the unsymmetric linear system Ax = b * using the Preconditioned BiConjugate Gradient method.
javadoc.author: Templates

javadoc.text: * Vectors for use in the iterative solution process
* Constructor for BiCG. Uses the given vector as template for creating * scratch vectors. Typically, the solution or the right hand side vector * can be passed, and the template is not modified
javadoc.param: templateVector to use as template for the work vectors needed in the * solution process
